statements: SELECT * FROM market_volatility;
SELECT symbol, price FROM market_volatility ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_volatility WHERE volume > 1000;
SELECT symbol, volume FROM market_volatility WHERE price < 50;
SELECT symbol, price, volume FROM market_volatility ORDER BY volume ASC, price DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_volatility WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, price FROM market_volatility WHERE volume > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT symbol, volume FROM market_volatility WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY volume ASC;
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price, MAX(volume) AS max_volume FROM market_volatility;
SELECT DISTINCT symbol, volume FROM market_volatility WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY symbol ASC, volume DESC;
SELECT * FROM price_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM volatility_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, price FROM price_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM volatility_data WHERE date >= '2022-03-01';
SELECT symbol, volatility FROM volatility_data ORDER BY volatility DESC, symbol ASC;
SELECT * FROM price_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, price FROM price_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price, MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM price_data WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL';
SELECT symbol, volatility, date FROM volatility_data WHERE volatility BETWEEN 0.05 AND 0.1 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT symbol, COUNT(*) AS price_count FROM price_data GROUP BY symbol HAVING COUNT(*) > 100;
SELECT * FROM market_volatility;
SELECT symbol, price FROM market_volatility WHERE price > 100;
SELECT symbol, timestamp FROM market_volatility ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, symbol FROM market_data WHERE volume > 10000 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM price_history WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_volatility WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM market_data GROUP BY symbol HAVING AVG(price) > 500 ORDER BY average_price DESC;
SELECT symbol, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM price_history WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' GROUP BY symbol;
SELECT symbol, SUM(volume) AS total_volume FROM market_data GROUP BY symbol ORDER BY total_volume DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT symbol, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM price_history WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY symbol;
SELECT * FROM volatility_records;
SELECT id, symbol, price, timestamp FROM volatility_records WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, price FROM volatility_records WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(price), MAX(price), MIN(price) FROM volatility_records GROUP BY symbol;
SELECT symbol, COUNT(*) as total_records FROM volatility_records GROUP BY symbol HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT symbol, price, timestamp FROM volatility_records WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, price, timestamp FROM volatility_records WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT source_name, COUNT(source_id) as count FROM market_data_sources GROUP BY source_name HAVING count > 5 ORDER BY count DESC;

SELECT symbol_name, AVG(price) as avg_price, MAX(price) as max_price FROM market_symbols JOIN price_history ON market_symbols.symbol_id = price_history.symbol_id GROUP BY symbol_name HAVING avg_price > 50 ORDER BY max_price DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT symbol_name FROM market_symbols WHERE symbol_name LIKE 'Tech%' ORDER BY symbol_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM prices ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT symbol, price FROM prices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT market_name, volatility FROM market_data WHERE volume > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT trade_id, symbol, price, quantity FROM trades ORDER BY trade_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM prices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT symbol, price FROM prices WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT market_name, volume FROM market_data WHERE volume < 1000 ORDER BY market_name ASC
SELECT trade_id, symbol, price, quantity FROM trades WHERE trade_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' AND quantity > 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE last_login IS NOT NULL
